title: MD
biography: Sir Michael John Owen FRCPsych FMedSci FLSW is a Welsh research scientist in the area of psychiatry, currently the head of the Division of Psychological Medicine and Clinical Neurosciences at Cardiff University.
aiSummary: Michael John Owen is a neuropsychiatric genetics specialist with an H-index of 208 at Cardiff University (Faculty). Has been published in Nature Genetics, JAMA Psychiatry, Nature medicine. Based in United Kingdom.
